snippet.title: The Fabulous Fear Machine - Exclusive Official Trailer | Black Summer 2023
snippet.description: Check out gameplay and more in this latest trailer for The Fabulous Fear Machine, an upcoming narrative-driven pulp horror strategy game. The Fabulous Fear Machine will be available on PC (via Steam, Epic Games Store, and GOG) on October 4, 2023.
